item.title: VN30 constituents: Second Half-Year 2017
item.description: The HSX announces the following constituent changes to the VN30. The changes will be applied from 24/07/2017 to 19/01/2018. Constituent changes can be accessed here Exclusions: HAG, HNG, ITA Inclusions: NVL, ROS, SAB For the details of how to construct the VN30, please click here The exchange rate using is 1USD = 23,000VND
